body_html:
same problem, but weirdly on my local machine running ubuntu 16.04 with python3.5 and pip and cuda 8.0 it works fine, while on the google cloud engine with same settings it crashes in jupyter but not in plain python:

Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 17 2016, 17:05:23)
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

import torch

body:
same problem, but weirdly on my local machine running ubuntu 16.04 with python3.5 and pip and cuda 8.0 it works fine, while on the google cloud engine with same settings it crashes in jupyter but not in plain python:

Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 17 2016, 17:05:23)
